import React from "react"; import { Pane, Text, Button, Heading, Paragraph, TextInputField, FormField, Avatar, BackButton, CrossIcon, InfoSignIcon, EditIcon, WarningSignIcon } from "evergreen-ui"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function AccountMgmtPage() { return (
{/* Seat description including avatar*/} {/* Parent class, defiines the row*/} {/* Children class, defiines the column*/} UserName Example@ntu.com - Yea

- This box should be dynamic depending on the id of the seat. {/* Booking Button*/} Please be at your seat by 15 mins

or your booking will be terminated {/* Below you can see the marginRight property on a Button. */} {/* textDecoration has to set to none or else the button will have a line below the Login text */}
); } export default AccountMgmtPage;
